mapper.insert: insert into course_pack (cid, name, brief, img, sort, homeId, teacher) values (#{cid}, #{name}, #{brief}, #{img},#{sort}, #{homeId}, #{teacher});

UPDATE course_pack
name = #{name},
brief = #{brief},
img = #{img},
homeId = #{homeId},
teacher = #{teacher},
sort = #{sort},
where cid = #{cid}
